A short story about a person who wakes up to a world without sunlight and tries to find out what happened.
A poem that explores the emotions of a person who witnesses the sun not rising and the impact it has on their day.
A science fiction novel that explores the idea of a solar eclipse lasting for an extended period of time and the consequences it has on the planet.
A non-fiction book that delves into the science behind why the sun doesn't rise on certain days, such as during a solar eclipse or winter.
A satirical piece that pokes fun at the idea of people being so obsessed with the sun that they would be upset if it didn't rise.
